contextId.occurrenceNote: Bowed knees are a picture of the whole person in an attitude of prayer. Alternate translation: "I bow down in prayer to the Father" or "I humbly pray to the Father" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: κάμπτω τὰ γόνατά μου πρὸς τὸν Πατέρα
contextId.glQuote: I bend my knees to the Father

contextId.occurrenceNote: This expression refers to people, not spirits who do not have human bodies. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-synecdoche]])
